==Installation==

Download the zip file, unzip the contents anywhere. The editor is AVRProjectIDE.exe, place a shortcut to it somewhere you want. When you want to open .avrproj files from Windows, in Window's "Open With" dialog, make it so that it always opens it with AVRProjectIDE.
